name: The Longest Night
description:
Context

The longest night is an endless game where you play as Santa Klaus delivering presents during the Christmas night. I wanted to create something with super simple controls (only move) but with enough complexity in the gameplay to make the game interesting.

It was done during... Christmas holidays of 2020.

Key Features
  • Control Rudolph, the first reindeer
  • Deliver presents during Christmas night
  • Explore procedurally generated islands
  • Focus only on directions
  • Combine many scoring mechanics to create super combos
  • Impress your friends with your highscores
  • Playable with mouse/touchpad/keyboard/controllers
